text:
@ChristinaKTLA @GavinNewsom Hey @GavinNewsom Didn’t realize #COVID19 distinguished between political movements. 

And @ericgarcetti is helping in the spread of #WuhanVirus as he cut $150m from #LAPD. So, who’s saying what?
